text: Juan Jesús Piñero Bolarín (born 13 July 1988), known as Pico, is a Spanish footballer who plays for CA Pulpileño as a forward. ==Football career== Born in Mula, Region of Murcia, Pico was a product of local Real Murcia's youth system. On 17 June 2006, before even having appeared for the reserves, he made his professional debut, coming on as a substitute for Samuel in the 62nd minute of a 1–1 away draw against Sporting de Gijón for the Segunda División.Sporting y Murcia se despiden de una gris temporada (Sporting and Murcia say goodbye to a sad season); Marca, 17 June 2006 Pico was later assigned to the B-side in Tercera División, and was loaned to UD Ibiza-Eivissa on 29 January 2008, until June.El Murcia cede al Eivissa al ariete Pico (Murcia loan forward Pico to Eivissa); Info Balear, 29 January 2008 He subsequently returned to the Pimentoneros, and alternated between the reserves and the first team during his spell, scoring a goal for the latter on 20 June 2009 in a 1–2 loss at Córdoba CF.Adelantamiento en la línea de meta (Finish- line takeover); Marca, 20 June 2009 Pico left Murcia in summer 2010 and joined another reserve team, Getafe CF B in Segunda División B. He subsequently resumed his career in the same level but also in the fourth tier, representing Caravaca CF, UCAM Murcia CF,Juan Jesús Piñero 'Pico' ficha por la UCAM (Juan Jesús Piñero 'Pico' signs for UCAM) ; Mahulalarica, 21 July 2012 Orihuela CF,Ernesto y Pico apuestan por el ascenso del Orihuela (Ernesto and Pico bet in Orihuela's promotion); Diario Información, 28 January 2015 CF Lorca Deportiva and Real Jaén. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:People from Río Mula Category:Spanish footballers Category:Murcian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Segunda División players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:Real Murcia players Category:Real Murcia Imperial players Category:Getafe CF B players Category:Caravaca CF players Category:UCAM Murcia CF players Category:Orihuela CF players Category:Real Jaén footballers
title: Pico (footballer)
